flavor_text_entries.flavor_text:
戦いで　ミノが　壊れてしまうと
近くにある　材料で
ミノを　すぐに　作り直す。

If its cloak is broken in battle, it quickly remakes
the cloak with materials nearby.

Se il suo manto si rompe mentre lotta, lo rifà velocemente con
ciò che trova attorno a sé.

Si su caparazón se rompe en combate, lo rehace rápidamente
con lo que tenga a mano.

Wird sein Umhang im Kampf zerstört, macht es sich schnell
aus dem, was es findet, einen neuen.

S’il perd sa cape au combat, il en tisse rapidement
une nouvelle avec ce qui lui tombe sous la main.

싸움으로 도롱이가 부서져 버리면
가까이 있는 재료로
도롱이를 바로 만들어 고친다.

たたかいで　ミノが　こわれてしまうと
ちかくにある　ざいりょうで
ミノを　すぐに　つくりなおす。

冷たい　木枯らしを　防ぐため
小枝や　落ち葉を　材料に
ミノを　作り　体を　覆う。

To shelter itself from cold, wintry winds, it covers
itself with a cloak made of twigs and leaves.

Per ripararsi dal freddo e dai venti invernali si copre con un
manto fatto di rami e foglie.

Para protegerse de los vientos fríos invernales, se cubre con
un caparazón de ramas y hojas.

Um sich vor dem eisigen Winterwind zu schützen, legt es sich
unter einen Umhang aus Ästen und Laub.

Pour se protéger des vents glacés de l’hiver, il s’est tissé
une cape de feuilles et de brindilles.

차가운 초겨울 바람을 막으려고
작은 가지나 낙엽을 재료로
도롱이를 만들어 몸을 감싼다.

つめたい　こがらしを　ふせぐため
こえだや　おちばを　ざいりょうに
ミノを　つくり　からだを　おおう。

戦いで　ミノが　壊れてしまうと
近くにある　材料で
ミノを　すぐに　作り直す。

If its cloak is broken in battle, it quickly remakes
the cloak with materials nearby.

une nouvelle avec ce qui lui tombe sous la main.

Um sich vor dem eisigen Winterwind zu schützen,
legt es sich unter einen Umhang aus Ästen und Laub.

tissé une cape de feuilles et de brindilles.

차가운 초겨울 바람을 막으려고
작은 가지나 낙엽을 재료로
도롱이를 만들어 몸을 감싼다.

つめたい　こがらしを　ふせぐため
こえだや　おちばを　ざいりょうに
ミノを　つくり　からだを　おおう。

Even if it is born where there are
no cocooning materials, it somehow
always ends up with a cloak.

Even if it is born where there are
no cocooning materials, it somehow
always ends up with a cloak.

Even if it is born where there are
no cocooning materials, it somehow
always ends up with a cloak.

Nul ne sait comment il y parvient,
mais il arrive toujours à se former
une cape, où qu’il soit.

Even if it is born where there are
no cocooning materials, it somehow
always ends up with a cloak.

Nul ne sait comment il y parvient,
mais il arrive toujours à se former
une cape, où qu’il soit.

It covers itself with a cloak to
shelter from the cold. When it’s
hot, its cloak is thinner.

hot, its cloak is thinner.

no cocooning materials, it somehow
always ends up with a cloak.

form_descriptions.description: Forms only affect appearance, although they become permanent upon evolution.  Wild and newly-hatched Burmy are always in a Plant Cloak.  Burmy's cloak changes to match the terrain after a battle it participated in: Plant Cloak by default; Sandy Cloak in sandy or rocky areas, such as beaches, caves, and trails; and Trash Cloak in buildings.
